DESCRIPTION_DETAILS: Add a description for your frame (optional)
DROP_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Add the image you want to add labels for
UPLOAD_IMAGE_NOTE: You can upload up your image here
DRAG_DROP_EXERCISE_TITLE: Drag and drop these labels into the correct frame of the image
PREVIEW_NOTE: Here is what your application will look like from a reader's perspective. To modify any settings, please return to the previous steps.
START_ADDING_LABEL_HELPER_TEXT: To add a new label, click on the desired location on the image.
UNCONFIGURED_ITEM: The item you are trying to reach is not configured yet!
